comment.author: 23492747@N04
comment._content: The photographer must have been out at about 6 o'clock in the morning in midsummer to find this location so empty of people!  I would guess these superb shots of Belem to be about the mid 1970s.

comment.author: 37530958@N02
comment._content:
De facto, esta fotografia é de 1964/princípio de 1965.
Pode ver-se o Planetário em construção. Este foi inaugurado em Julho de 1965.

comment.author: 23492747@N04
comment._content: Thank you - the scene is even earlier than I thought!  I presume that is the ground of Belenenses football club in the background?
